reward.description: Increases acquired XP by 30%. 24hours time-limited item.
It increases acquired SP by 30%. 24hours time-limited item.
Item acquisition through hunting + 30%. 5hours time-limited item.
Active Skill: P. Atk/M. Atk/Skill Critical Rate/ Skill Critical Damage + 20% for 10 seconds. Olympiad Only.
Active Skill: Atk. Spd/Casting Spd. +20%, Speed +60 and Skill Cooldown Time - 20% for 10 seconds. Olympiad Only.
Active Skill: Cancels hide, invincibility and talisman buffs of nearby targets for 9 seconds. Olympiad Only.
